title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings and chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): chat, multi-model, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, micronaut/spring integrations, Android friendly.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama’s REST API for Rails and plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, manage models, keyboard driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models, supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for integration testing.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for RAG, fine-tuning, function calling, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-nvidia-jetson
summary: Optimized Docker images and build scripts for running Ollama on NVIDIA Jetson devices.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain in under 100 lines.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Self-hosted model registry with UI and REST API to cache, version and share Ollama models inside an org.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat with Ollama models privately or in channels.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands: summarize, rewrite, translate, extract tags via Ollama.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot/Paper plugin bringing LLM-powered NPCs and chat assistants to Minecraft servers via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
